The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.

The first row has five filled squares, the second row has five filled squares, the third row has three filled squares, the fourth row has five filled squares, and the fifth row has five filled squares. The sixth row has five filled squares. There are two X's in the third row, one in the second row, and one in the fourth row.
